meanings.definition: In a fast or rapid manner.
meanings.sent1: She ran quickly to catch the bus.
meanings.sent2: He finished his homework quickly so he could go play outside.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel quickly climbed the tree to escape the barking dog.
meanings.sent4: Time flies quickly when you're having fun.
meanings.sent5: The car quickly zoomed past us on the highway.

meanings.sent1: The cheetah quickly chased its prey across the savannah.
meanings.sent2: The student quickly raised their hand to answer the teacher's question.
meanings.sent3: The magician quickly pulled a rabbit out of the hat, surprising the audience.
meanings.sent4: The news quickly spread throughout the small town like wildfire.
meanings.sent5: The athlete quickly crossed the finish line, winning the race.
